src:
海鮮菠蘿炒飯 好開胃（視頻）

02 Nov 2019, 03:48

【新唐人北京時間2019年11月02日訊】海鮮菠蘿炒飯
2人份量 Serve 2菠蘿 1 Pineapple白飯 200g Rice洋蔥 ¼ Onion
雞蛋 1 Egg蝦仁 Shrimps帶子 Scallops蟹柳 Crab Willows八爪魚粒 Diced Octopus魚露 ½ tsp Fish Sauce
豬肉鬆 Pork Floss腰果 Cashews提子乾 Raisins魚露 1tsp Fish Sauce胡椒粉 Ground White Pepper咖喱粉 ½-1 tsp Curry Powder砂糖 1tsp Sugar鹽 1/8tsp Salt

text:
Seafood pineapple fried rice good appetizer (video)

02 Nov 2019, 03:48

[New Tang Dynasty, Beijing time, November 02, 2019] Seafood pineapple fried rice
Serving 2 Pineapple 1 Pineapple Rice 200g Rice Onion 1⁄4 Onion
Eggs 1 Egg Shrimp Shrimps Strap Scallops Crab Willows Crab Willows Octopus Fish Diced Octopus Fish Lotion 1⁄2 tsp Fish Sauce
Pork Loin Pork Floss Cashew Cashews Raisins Fish Sauce 1tsp Fish Sauce Pepper Ground White Pepper Curry Powder 1⁄2-1 tsp Curry Powder Sugar 1tsp Sugar Salt 1/8tsp Salt
